filter.title: Filter
filter.description:
The list of initial concepts and codes on which to filter the data.  You can obtain a list of all available
         concepts for a dataset by querying http://stat.abs.gov.au/itt/query.jsp?method=GetDatasetConcepts&datasetid=ABS_CENSUS2011_B25
         (or equivalent) and a list of the possible values for a concept by querying
         http://stat.abs.gov.au/itt/query.jsp?method=GetCodeListValue&datasetid=ABS_CENSUS2011_B25&concept=MEASURE&format=json.

dataSetID.title: Dataset ID
dataSetID.description: The ID of the ABS dataset.  You can obtain a list of all datasets by querying http://stat.abs.gov.au/itt/query.jsp?method=GetDatasetList (or equivalent)

regionType.title: Region Type
regionType.description:
The ABS region type to query.  You can obtain a list of all available region types for
        a dataset by querying http://stat.abs.gov.au/itt/query.jsp?method=GetCodeListValue&datasetid=ABS_CENSUS2011_B25&concept=REGIONTYPE&format=json

regionConcept.title: Region Concept
regionConcept.description:
The ABS region concept.  You can obtain a list of all available concepts for
         a dataset by querying http://stat.abs.gov.au/itt/query.jsp?method=GetDatasetConcepts&datasetid=ABS_CENSUS2011_B19

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: the opacity (alpha) of the data item, where 0.0 is fully transparent and 1.0 is fully opaque.

displayPercent.title: Display percentage
displayPercent.description: Show percentages instead of raw values. True by default
